pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 過去にフレッチャー石油は日本企業から接触を受けた。
lessons.english: In the past, Fletcher Fuel was approached by Japanese companies.

lessons.japanese: トラックが橋梁に接触した。
lessons.english: A truck came into contact with the bridge supports.

lessons.japanese: 父は海外にいる間、手紙や電話でわれわれと接触し続けた。
lessons.english: Father kept in touch with us by mail and telephone while he was overseas.

lessons.japanese: 父は海外にいる間、手紙や電話でわれわれと接触し続けた。
lessons.english: My father kept in touch with us by mail and telephone while he was overseas.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は外国人と接触する機会がない。
lessons.english: She has no chances of coming in contact with foreigners.

lessons.japanese: 彼は色々な種類の人と接触する。
lessons.english: He comes into contact with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼は色々な種類の人と接触する。
lessons.english: He is in touch with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼は私が誘拐犯人と接触出来るようにしてくれた。
lessons.english: He put me in touch with the kidnappers.

lessons.japanese: 彼はあらゆる種類の人と接触する。
lessons.english: He comes into contact with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼と接触を保ってはいけない。
lessons.english: You must not keep in touch with him.
